means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 鲍尔斯取自父名，来源于Ball↑3，含义是“鲍尔之子”(son of Ball)

sentence.Network_cn: 我听着金属球相撞的声音。

sentence.Network_en: I never had the balls to do anything like this.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从来没胆量做这种事。

entry.def: If you say that someone has balls, you mean that they have courage.

example.ex: To work on this show you've  got to have balls...
example.tran: 要参与这个节目的制作，你得够大胆。

example.ex: I never had the balls to do anything like this.
example.tran: 我从来没胆量做这种事。

entry.def: You can say 'balls' or say that what someone says is balls when you think that it is stupid or wrong.

auth_sentence.content: This is, apparently, what Ed Balls believes.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is, apparently, what Ed Balls believes.
